special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of The Eternal Echo, create a colorless Echo planeswalker token at the beginning of your next end step and put 3 loyalty counters on it. It gains that ability, except it costs [-1].
[+1]: You gain 2 life.
[+0]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. 
[-2]: Each opponent loses 2 life.
[-5]: Draw a card.
